A suicide bomber in Egypt attacks a tourist site in Luxor.
In Italy, Prime Minister Renzi welcomes Putin,...
...but acknowledges the tensions created by economic sanctions.
In Turkey, the head of the pro-Kurdish opposition party...
...accuses the government of inaction over violence.
In China, the identification of sunken cruise victims' belongings starts.
And finally from Russia, Moscow sees no threat to the World Cup amid controversy,...
...while FIFA Secretary General Valcke hits back over ten-million-dollar transactions.
